locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Young Filmmakers Rick and Frank are moving to Los Angeles for 90 days on a low budget to find out how accessible Hollywood is for a European newcomer. Interviews with many people from the industry (mostly Dutch) and participations in a various number of productions as video clips, feature films, shorts and commercials will provide a clear image of a world of its own. Running out of money shortly after their arrival they have to come up with all kinds of solutions to survive the expensive west coast. Hollywood party's, big premieres and many new experiences will show the true life as a starting filmmaker in Hollywood.
imdb.title: Making Hollywood
plot: 2 young filmmakers move to Hollywood for 90 days to find out how to get access into the movie industry.::Rick de Graaff

Young Filmmakers Rick and Frank are moving to Los Angeles for 90 days on a low budget to find out how accessible Hollywood is for a European newcomer. Interviews with many people from the industry (mostly Dutch) and participations in a various number of productions as video clips, feature films, shorts and commercials will provide a clear image of a world of its own. Running out of money shortly after their arrival they have to come up with all kinds of solutions to survive the expensive west coast. Hollywood party's, big premieres and many new experiences will show the true life as a starting filmmaker in Hollywood.::Rick de Graaff
